N,M = map(int,input().split())
student = [list(map(int,input().split())) for _ in range(N)]
checkpoint = [list(map(int,input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

for i in range(N):
    dist = []
    for j in range(M):
        dist.append(abs(student[i][0]-checkpoint[j][0])+abs(student[i][1]-checkpoint[j][1]))
    print(dist.index(min(dist))+1)

N,M = map(int,input().split())
student = [list(map(int, input().split())) for i in range(N)]
checkpoint = [list(map(int, input().split())) for i in range(M)]

for i in range(N):
    dist = []
    for j in range(M):
        dist.append(abs(student[i][0]-checkpoint[j][0]) + abs(student[i][1]-checkpoint[j][1]))
    print(dist.index(min(dist)) + 1)

# input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
students = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)]
checkpoints = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

for student in students:
    distances = [abs(student[0]-checkpoint[0]) + abs(student[1]-checkpoint[1]) for checkpoint in checkpoints]
    print(distances.index(min(distances))+1)

# input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
students = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]
checkpoints = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)]

for student in students:
    distances = [abs(student[0]-checkpoint[0])+abs(student[1]-checkpoint[1]) for checkpoint in checkpoints]
    print(distances.index(min(distances))+1)

# input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
shops = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)]
checkpoints = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

for shop in shops:
    distances = [
        abs(shop[0]-checkpoint[0])+abs(shop[1]-checkpoint[1])
        for checkpoint in checkpoints
    ]
    print(distances.index(min(distances)) + 1)

N,M = map(int,input().split())#사람,체크포인트
student = [list(map(int,input().split())) for i in range(N)]#사람들의 위치
checkpoint = [list(map(int,input().split())) for i in range(M)]#체크포인트의 위치

for i in range(N):
    dist = []#거리를 저장할 리스트
    for j in range(M):
        dist.append(abs(student[i][0]-checkpoint[j][0])+abs(student[i][1]-checkpoint[j][1]))#거리 계산
    print(dist.index(min(dist))+1)#가장 가까운 체크포인트 출력


# input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
students = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]
checkpoints = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N-1)]

for student in students:
    distances = [abs(student[0]-checkpoint[0])+abs(student[1]-checkpoint[1]) for checkpoint in checkpoints]
    print(distances.index(min(distances))+1)

# input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
shops = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)]
checkpoints = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

for shop in shops:
    distances = [abs(shop[0]-checkpoint[0])+abs(shop[1]-checkpoint[1]) for checkpoint in checkpoints]
    print(distances.index(min(distances))+1)
# 가장 가까운 공원

N,M = map(int,input().split())#사람,체크포인트 입력
student = [list(map(int,input().split())) for i in range(N)]#사람들의 위치 입력
checkpoint = [list(map(int,input().split())) for i in range(M)]#체크포인트의 위치 입력

for i in range(N):
    dist = []#거리를 저장할 리스트
    for j in range(M):
        dist.append(abs(student[i][0]-checkpoint[j][0])+abs(student[i][1]-checkpoint[j][1]))#거리 계산
    print(dist.index(min(dist))+1)#가장 가까운 체크포인트 출력


# input (N, M)
N, M = map(int, input().split())
# input (N, M)
shops = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)]
checkpoints = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

for shop in shops:
    distances = [abs(shop[0]-checkpoint[0])+abs(shop[1]-checkpoint[1]) for checkpoint in checkpoints]
    print(distances.index(min(distances))+1)
# 가장 가까운 공원

N, M = map(int, input().split())
student = [list(map(int, input().split())) for i in range(N)]
checkpoint = [list(map(int, input().split())) for i in range(M)]

for i in range(N):
    dist = []
    for j in range(M):
        dist.append(abs(student[i][0] - checkpoint[j][0]) + abs(student[i][1] - checkpoint[j][1]))
    print(dist.index(min(dist)) + 1)
